example.text: Over $18 billion taxpayer dollars were fraudulently paid out through California’s pandemic unemployment assistance program. Today I voted for the Protecting Taxpayers & Victims of Unemployment Fraud Act to help recover taxpayer dollars lost to fraud. [[url]]

The House passed a bill nearly two weeks ago to lift the debt ceiling. I hope during today’s meeting [[user]] puts his cards on the table so we can start finding common ground. The majority of Americans want us to work together, not play political games with our economy.

This week, I was proud to vote for this year's defense bill, which provides a 4.6% pay raise for our troops and a robust budget to counteract the damaging impacts of inflation on our Department of Defense and military families. I'm proud to support this bipartisan effort to provide our military with the equipment, resources, and training needed to effectively defend the United States against our adversaries.

What do you think Congress' biggest priority should be in the new year? Bring more water to the Valley Conduct oversight of the Biden Administration Fight inflation Lower taxes Reduce gas prices Secure the border Strengthen our national defense Support our small businesses Other Submit survey to sign up for updates.

Supporting our Service Members and Strengthening our National Security Each year for the last six decades, Congress has passed a defense bill to authorize funding for all discretionary military programs and activities - including personnel, operations, maintenance, procurement, research, and development. It also outlines critical policies and directives for the Department of Defense.

This week, I was proud to vote for this year's defense bill, which provides a 4.6% pay raise for our troops and a robust budget to counteract the damaging impacts of inflation on our Department of Defense and military families. I'm proud to support this bipartisan effort to provide our military with the equipment, resources, and training needed to effectively defend the United States against our adversaries.
